overview:
A U.S. national and partner in the firm, Nicolas began his career in IT services. He later specialized in financial transactions for high-tech firms, first at JP Morgan then as a financial analyst at the investment bank Hambrecht & Quist, where he participated in IPOs for several companies. In 1999, he joined ABN AMRO Capital France as an Associate Manager for the venture business.

Nicolas has a degree in Mathematics and Information Technology from the University of Michigan and an MBA from Ã‰cole des Ponts et ChaussÃ©es.
